$NVDA the odds have gone up for my short put to hold out of the money thru Friday which is needed for maximum profit. The bids are going up and filling AH which I interpret as a bullish bias. It is difficult to call a turn to a huge down trend which was what I saw. If I had to do this trade again, I would have filled my short put at $210 rather than $212.50   Price movement on $NVDA is so quick and big. It is difficult to read and if you trade just 5 days at a time, sentiment and price movement is what you are trading.  The "Odds" of your opinion being right is the difference between being up $21K or down $30k     BUT it's an exciting game which I love!!!
